description:
The protagonist, Zhang Chulan, leads a very common college student's life until he finds himself caught up in a terrible incident that happened in a small village. As he was walking through a graveyard, Zhang Chulan is assaulted by jianshi. Thinking that it was over for him, a mysterious girl carrying a sword suddenly saves him and disappears. This strange encounter is going to change drastically the fate of our hero.

(Source: Shanghai Emon)

tags.name: Martial Arts
tags.description: Centers around the use of traditional hand-to-hand combat.

tags.name: Cultivation
tags.description: Features characters using training, often martial arts-related, and other special methods to cultivate qi (a component of traditional Chinese philosophy, described as "life force") and gain strength or immortality.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Zombie
tags.description: Prominently features reanimated corpses which often prey on live humans and turn them into zombies.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Wuxia
tags.description: Chinese fiction concerning the adventures of martial artists in Ancient China.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

alternative: Chou Shakurin (ちょうしゃくりん)

node.description:
CEO and founder of [Dongman Tang](https://anilist.co/staff/122600/Dongman-Tang)

*Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/267912).*
